conclusion: Need to analyze the flow of liquid through channels A, B, C, D, E, and F to predict which container (E or F) the liquid will flow into.
Arrows labeled A, B, C, D indicate the direction of flow from A to B, B to C, C to D, and D to E.
Baffles are the channels labeled E and F.
Liquid flows from A to B, B to C, C to D, and finally D to E.
Liquid will flow through the channels labeled E and F.
Liquid will flow into the container labeled F.
The liquid will flow into container F.
